about_the_game:
Welcome to CoinForge, the ultimate clicker game where you generate and collect S-Coins! Click your way to riches and watch your wealth grow!!!

Features:

  • S-coins, of course: Click to generate S-Coins and build your fortune!
  • Mint S-Coins to create unique ones.
  • Design submissions via Steam Workshop! : Get involved in shaping the game. Submit your designs for in-game items and see your creations come to life!

Why CoinForge?


  • Stable Economy: Enjoy a virtual economy that's more stable than any central bank.
  • Updates: Look forward to new features and items with updates.
  • Events and Competitions: Participate in seasonal events and compete for exclusive rewards.

The CoinForge Market:

Imagine playing the stock market, where your clicks earn you valuable currency. In CoinForge, the more players join and click, the more S-Coins are circulating, creating a dynamic and stable market. Our goal? To create a completely independent currency exchange system on Steam, where S-Coins become a trusted medium of exchange.

Coin Drop System:

In CoinForge, coins with different values drop at set chances:

  • 1 million S-Coin: Chance of 1 in 1,000,000
  • 100,000 S-Coin: Chance of 1 in 100,000
  • 10,000 S-Coin: Chance of 1 in 10,000
  • 1,000 S-Coin: Chance of 1 in 1,000
  • 100 S-Coin: Chance of 1 in 100
  • 10 S-Coin: Chance of 1 in 10
  • 1 S-Coin: Chance of 1 in 1

Coin Conversion:

You can also convert your S-Coins using a simple exchange rate. For example, 10 coins of value 1 can be exchanged for 1 coin of value 10, etc...

Future Plans:

In the future, you'll be able to craft coins with community-designed items, minting them at certain values. This means the community can directly contribute to the in-game economy, adding their creativity and designs to the CoinForge world.

Join CoinForge today and start your journey towards becoming the ultimate S-coin tycoon. Click, collect, and conquer in a game where your financial dreams can come true!

Get ready to click and earn!

legal_notice:
END USER LICENSE AGREEMENT (EULA)

Last Updated: 29.08.2024

1. Introduction

This End User License Agreement ("Agreement") is a binding legal contract between you ("User" or "You") and Aleksander Dolny ("Company", "We", "Us", or "Our"), governing your use of the CoinForge game ("Game"). By downloading, installing, or using the Game through the Steam platform, you acknowledge and agree to be bound by the terms of this Agreement. If you do not agree to these terms, do not download, install, or use the Game.

2. License Grant

Subject to your compliance with this Agreement, We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, and revocable license to access and use the Game for personal, non-commercial purposes. This license is strictly subject to the terms outlined in this Agreement and Steam's Subscriber Agreement.

3. Usage Restrictions

You agree not to, and you will not allow others to:

Use unauthorized third-party software, scripts, bots, or any other methods to cheat, exploit, automate, or manipulate the Game in any form.
Attempt to reverse engineer, decompile, disassemble, or otherwise derive the source code of the Game.
Modify, adapt, or create derivative works based on the Game.
Rent, lease, lend, sell, sublicense, distribute, or otherwise transfer the Game or any copies thereof.
Remove, alter, or obscure any proprietary notices, trademarks, or labels associated with the Game.
4. Prohibition of Cheating and Botting

Cheating and the use of bots are strictly prohibited. This includes, but is not limited to:

Utilizing any software or device that automates gameplay or provides an unfair advantage.
Exploiting any in-game bugs, glitches, or vulnerabilities.
Participating in any actions that negatively impact the gameplay experience of others.
Sharing or distributing any tools or methods related to cheating or botting.
Violation of these rules may result in the immediate revocation of your license to use the Game and may lead to the permanent banning of your account.

5. Termination

This Agreement remains in effect until terminated. Your rights under this Agreement will terminate automatically and without notice if you fail to comply with any of its terms. Upon termination, you must cease all use of the Game and delete all copies of the Game from your devices.

6. Updates and Modifications

We reserve the right to update or modify the Game and this Agreement at any time. Your continued use of the Game following any such changes constitutes your acceptance of the revised terms. If you do not agree with the updated terms, you must discontinue your use of the Game and uninstall it.

7. Disclaimer of Warranties

The Game is provided "as is" and "as available," without any warranties of any kind. To the fullest extent permitted by applicable law, We disclaim all warranties, express, implied, or statutory, including but not limited to, implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement.

8. Limitation of Liability

To the fullest extent permitted by applicable law, in no event shall We be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or related to your use of or inability to use the Game.

9. Contact Information

If you have any questions or concerns about this Agreement, you can contact us at:

CoinForge

name: CoinForge

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/ 8/10/ 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/ 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: CoinForge is a clicker game where you generate S-coins! Click to earn S-coins and exchange them. Try to get your S-Coins every day with every 100 Clicks you press. 3 is max per day. It's time to forge fortune with Coin Forge. Join our community on Discord and help shape the game!
